    • Method Detail

      • start_filter

        public static <T extends Filter> int start_filter(Class<T> classname,
                                  String[] args)
        Start a filter. The first parameter is the class of the filter (for instance, if your filter class name is MyFilter, the first parameter will be MyFilter.class). The second argument is the command line argument given by the "main" method.
        Parameters:
        classname - The class object of your filter.
        args - The "main" command line argument.
        Returns:
        The return code of the application.

      • pipe

        public static Pipe_Info pipe()
        Return the metadata of the current pipe.
        Returns:
        Pipe info.

      • filter

        public static Filter_Info filter()
        Return the metadata of the current filter.
        Returns:
        Filter info.

      • new_handle

        public static Handle new_handle()
        Create a new handle connected with the PaF.
        Returns:
        A new handle.
